name: TheFableoftheWeekFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Fables are a potent way to remind us of the many bottom lines in life. This flash briefing lets you listen to such fables, one fresh fable posted every week, and read to you by voice actor Derek Botten.

For more on Derek Botten, please go to: http://www.derekbotten.com/

If you would like your very own flash briefing, please check out: https://www.witlingo.com/flashbriefing/

This skill is hosted by Witlingo.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
